Case studies
VISUALPLANT is the platform-behind-the-platform for architects, designers and real estate professionals. We powered a user-generated, editorially-curated, vertical social-net called "Upstairs in the Material"


Visit
VP re-launched Creativity — the industry-standard business social network for commercial design and production. A precision mix of freemium, subscription and ad-supported business models, the site offers 1,000s of curated spots and video interviews with gurus and veterans of the industry. We encoded their entire archive of video and reliably served YouTube-level surges in viral traffic.


IZNOTV uses VP Platform to remind us that when everything is media, there 'is no tv.' Guidance is internal.


milesperhour.com, a destination for curation of user-generated film, uses VP for user-generated content, encoding, content management, reporting and distribution.


Graphic artists, like dib, use VP to promote their online portfolios.
